scripts.how-to-api-generation+pkg-build: npm run clean-install, then generate-3.0.1, then build which generates index.js in dist/lib
scripts.tip0: this is work in progress; these tips act as comments for this package.json
scripts.tip1: typescriptThreePlus=true additional-property so global fetch is not overwritten; typescriptThreePlus available in generator 5.1.1, but not in 6.2.1 (latest stable 20221208)
scripts.tip3: withoutRuntimeChecks=true in additional properties to not generate ToJSON, FromJSON
scripts.tip4: stringsEnum additional property - noticed no difference
scripts.tip5: debugging (debugModels & debugOperations print out huge, unusable json in the terminal): --global-property debugOpenAPI (Prints out the JSON model of the OpenAPI Document, as seen by OpenAPI Generator); debugModels (Prints out the JSON model passed to model templates); debugOperations (Prints out the JSON model passed to operation (api) templates); debugSupportingFiles (Prints out the JSON model passed to supporting files)
scripts.tip6: import type statement starting with TypeScript 3.8
scripts.tip8: // @ts-nocheck in .ts files added in typescript 3.7beta https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-3-7-beta/#ts-nocheck-in-typescript-files -> use 3.7.2?
scripts.tip9: live Public-API.v1.json uses openapi 3.1.0, which is not yet supported by openapi generator; local uses openapi 3.0.1
scripts.tip10: todo: should we update openapitools.js to use generator-cli version 5.3.0 instead of 5.1.1? it adds an optional initRequest arg to API call functions in the generated code
scripts.tip13: version update: generator-cli version in openapitools.json: https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator/releases
scripts.tip14: DON'T PUBLISH from public-packages/extensibility, but from public-packages/extensibility/dist
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && npm run build && npm publish && git push origin HEAD:main && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.clean-install: rimraf node_modules && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.get-generator-templates: rimraf templates && openapi-generator-cli author template -o templates -g typescript-fetch
scripts.todo-ts-nocheck: investigate ts errors in browser on projects/task-inbox hot reload, and remove ts-nocheck statement added in api files handling Blobs
scripts.todo: remove local Public-API-v1.json, 3.0.1 generator in openapitools.json and 3.0.1 scripts in package.json when openapitools supports OpenApi v3.1.0
scripts.generate-3.0.1: rimraf src/lc-public-api && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key=lc-public-api-3.0.1 && npm run removeErrorResponseImportFromApis
scripts.generate-3.0.1-withStringEnums: rimraf src/lc-public-api && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key=lc-public-api-3.0.1-withStringEnums && npm run removeErrorResponseImportFromApis
scripts.build: npm run clean-install && npm run generate-3.0.1-withStringEnums && npm run build-prod
scripts.publish: npm run preversion && npm run version-patch && npm run postversion
